186021581.review:
Coisas que fiz nesse jogo:   

-Entro no servidor, com a esperança de ajudar meu time e sair vivo. O plano é simples: seguir ordens e não fazer besteira.
-Começo pilotando um helicóptero. Tudo vai bem até eu acertar uma árvore a 20 metros da base. Explosão total.
-Decido ser soldado de infantaria. Ando por meia hora até chegar no combate e sou recebido com um tiro na cabeça.
-Revivo com espírito de revanche e pego um jipe. Atropelo metade do meu esquadrão e sou expulso do grupo no chat.
-Resolvo ser rádio-operador, achando que agora vai. Gasto 30 minutos configurando o rádio e finalmente peço apoio aéreo.
-Os bombardeiros chegam... e destroem a nossa própria base. Eu só consigo assistir ao caos de longe.
-Aparece um tanque inimigo e me atropela antes de eu processar o que aconteceu.
-Desligo o jogo pensando: "Nunca me diverti tanto sendo tão ruim".

185618233.review:
Just Cause 3. A game I originally purchased in 2015 on my Xbox One, and wow did I think it was one of the coolest games ever. Then skip ahead to late 2018, when my friends all chipped in to help purchase the parts & to help build my very first (and still current gaming PC). It turned out to be the best thing ever, but also a memory I would forever cherish. Within the first day of owning my new PC, Just Cause 3 happened to be one of the first games I ever bought due to my fond memories of it from a few years prior. It turned out to be everything I wanted, a fun, vibrant, pretty, engaging game that is simple to pick up and play. I sunk probably 15 hours or so into it before I stopped playing due to my influx of new steam games and curiosity to try them all. Skip ahead another 5 years, to current 24 year old me typing this review right after fully 100%ing the game for the first, and last time...

This game brings be back to simpler times. Times where games didn't have to have the best story or the best graphics or the most content in the world to be the best. They just needed to be FUN. And Just Cause 3 nails the mark in that regard. Blowing stuff up, slingshotting random civilians clear across Medici, or just flying around in your wingsuit for hours while talking to friends on Discord. It is excellent.

Just Cause 3 not only brings me back to simpler gaming time, but a simpler time in my life. A time with friends that I realized I took advantage of in the moment. A time of simplicity, where a job wasn't yet mandatory and school was easy. A time when gaming wasn't just a short pastime, it was every Saturday night with the boys. A time I find myself longing for every now and then. This game will always serve as a reminder that no matter how much time passes or how old I am, it is ok to sit down and just have fun.

185479377.review:
Jogaço!!
Esse jogo é incrível, sua história envolvente, seu mapa amplo e sua jogabilidade divertida se tornaram o motivo de eu ter tantas horas jogadas nesse jogo.
Os gráficos, mesmo em qualidade mediana ainda são ótimos, dando um ar de que se está assistindo um filme de ação bem mentiroso e viajado. A jogabilidade para mim foi o principal, pois o jogo te permite usar desde meras pistolas a bazucas capazes de causar uma mini explosão nuclear, além de veículos que podem ser de um mísero carrinho de rolimã (literalmente) a um caça, sem falar no gancho e todos os outros apetrechos do protagonista que podem fazer você sair voando como um verdadeiro super-herói. 
Outro ponto alto do jogo é sua progressão, pois tem uma ampla árvore de habilidades que pode ajudar de diversas formas. 
Além, é claro, da história, que é muito interessante, porém meio curta com apenas 24 missões, sendo algumas bem bobas e sem necessidade, porém a história realmente é envolvente, você sente um ódio pelo vilão, além de em todo o ambiente do mapa ser perceptível a situação de necessidade da ilha de ser libertada de toda a ditadura. O defeito da história é a conclusão, que não acontece, sem spoilers, mas acredito que poderia haver uma finalização melhor para a história
Ainda não joguei as DLCs, mas talvez elas possam elevar a experiência do jogo, quem sabe posteriormente...
Recomendo Just Cause 3 e considero um dos melhores jogos que joguei esse ano

The Steam Clown Award is an absolutely stupid concept. It serves no real purpose other than to belittle and shame people, offering no constructive value whatsoever. Instead of encouraging positive feedback or meaningful critique, it just reinforces a culture of mockery and pointless trolling. The whole idea is absurd—it’s not even a genuine award, just a ridiculous label meant to humiliate. The fact that it’s even taken seriously by some people is baffling, as it contributes nothing but negativity. In a space where feedback and improvement should be prioritized, the Steam Clown Award is just a senseless, juvenile distraction that serves no beneficial function.

Anyways... great game! Underrated IMO, 4 was a flop, this one is by FAR the best just cause. Good story, good mechanics and graphics for a 10 year old game. Wait until a sale, definitely worth it.

185157447.review: 难以想象，本作已经是一部接近十年前的作品了，即使是放在大作云集的现在，正当防卫3依旧量大管饱，爽快无双的代表之作。剧情上和前两部一样浅薄无内涵，依旧是推翻暴君的统治。不过说实话，这个系列的卖点从来不是剧情，玩家不需要考虑那么多有的没的，所要做的就是化身里科·大西王，拿起武器朝所有敌人开火就可以了。游戏性上，玩家可以使用大量浮夸的武器，射击的手感也相当爽，解压感拉满。载具的种类也很多，海陆空机甲应有尽有，让人应接不暇。但是操纵手感很差，除了机甲和火箭船，我感觉别的手感都稀烂。而且比较离谱的是很多载具的按钮是强行绑定的，像我这习惯不同载具用不同开火按钮的玩家，需要来回切换按钮，太折磨了。不过，dlc做的非常好，加入了中等规模的拓展任务，同时让主角的装备进一步升级。滑翔翼和降落伞不够爽？那就试试几乎无限动力的飞行背包吧!武器还不够爽？那就用无限弹药的雷电枪掌控雷霆吧!不过，本作的缺点还是极其明显的，虽然玩起来极其畅快，但还没有做到像doom一样能依靠长板而让玩家几乎忽视短板。本作和育碧罐头很像，任务重复度极其高，而且存在大量的收集品和挑战，要命的是只有完成挑战才能获得升级技能的齿轮，在几个小时的新鲜感过后，迎来的便是大量单调乏味的重复任务。我个人评8.4分吧，手感爽快，量大管饱，画面在现在看来也不过时，而且史低价也相对便宜，还是值得一试的。

185111763.review:
[b]Genel Bakış[/b]


Just Cause 3, kaos, patlama ve özgürlük üzerine kurulu devasa bir açık dünya aksiyon oyunu. Aslında, eğer Just Cause 2'yi beğendiyseniz, Just Cause 3'ün gelişmiş sürümünü bulacaksınız. Oyun, Kapa Eyaleti'ni ele geçirmek için geri dönen Rico Rodriguez'i takip ediyor. Bu sefer sadece özgürlük değil, aynı zamanda savaşın sert ve yıkıcı taraflarını daha fazla yaşayabiliyoruz. Helikopterler, uçaklar, zırhlı araçlar ve çeşitli silahlarla donanmış bir oyun dünyası var. Bu dünyada büyük patlamalar yapma ve kaos yaratma özgürlüğü, Just Cause serisinin asıl çekim alanını oluşturuyor. Grafiksel olarak daha iyi işlenmiş ama yine de temel amacı aksiyon dolu patlamalar ve özgürlük.

[b]Oynanış Mekanikleri[/b]

Just Cause 3 ile beraber, eski oyunla kıyaslanamayacak kadar fazla özellik var. Rico, düşman üslerine saldırırken, çok daha dinamik bir ortamla karşılaşıyoruz. En büyük yeni mekaniklerden biri, onu haritaya hızla taşımanıza ve keşfettiğiniz tüm ortamları serbest bırakmanıza olanak tanıyan harita bağlantı noktaları. Bu size geniş bir hareket özgürlüğü sunuyor. Diğer ilgi çekici mekanikler arasında "wingsuit" (kanat takımı) kullanarak yüksek dağlardan aşağı süzülmek veya “grappling hook” (kanca) ile özgürce her yere tutunmak var. Bu mekanikler o kadar etkileyici ki çoğu zaman görevden daha eğlenceli hale geliyor. Ancak bazı görevlerde zorluklar da mevcut ve en büyük sorunları da Just Cause 3'ün bazen karmaşık hale gelmesi. Aynı zamanda bazı aşamalar tekdüze hale gelebiliyor. Eğer bir yerde çok fazla patlama yapıyorsanız ve sürekli aynı şeyleri yapıyorsanız, sıradanlaşıyor.

[b]Grafikler ve Ses[/b]

Grafikler, özellikle harita, harita içindeki detaylar ve etrafta yaptığınız yıkımlar konusunda oldukça iyi. Çevredeki dünya gerçekten etkileyici, hareketli su alanları, ateş ve duman efektleri her şey güzel görünüyor. Ancak, bazen uzak mesafeler için düşük çözünürlük tekstürleri ortaya çıkabiliyor. Ses tasarımı ise atmosferin içine girmemizi sağlıyor; helikopterlerin çırpınması, patlamaların yıkıcı gürültüsü ve tabi ki yükselen müzik her anına aksiyon katıyor. Ancak ses efektleri ve bazı diyalogların doğallıktan uzak olduğu yerler var. Animasyonlar da bazen garip kalabiliyor, özellikle patlamalar veya düşmanların hareketleri doğal hissettirmiyor.

[b]Zorluk ve Derinlik[/b]

Zorluk seviyesi, görevlerin ilerleyişine göre değişiyor ama genelde keyifli bir seviyede kalıyor. Bazı görevlerde basitçe saldırmak yeterli olabilirken, bazıları belirli stratejiler ve kancayı düzgün kullanmak gerektiriyor. Görevlerin çoğu birbirine benzer olsa da, yeni mekanikler sürekli oyunun temposunu taze tutmayı başarıyor. Ama bir noktada, tüm harita üzerinde aynı tipte görevlerin tekrarı rahatsız edici olabiliyor. Eğer derinlemesine bir hikâye veya karmaşık görevler bekliyorsanız, Just Cause 3 sizi tatmin etmeyebilir.

[b]Pozitif:[/b]

-Eğlenceli ve özgürce aksiyon yaratma mekanikleri
-Harika grafikler ve detaylı açık dünya
-Çeşitli araçlar ve uçuş seçenekleri
-Gelişmiş "grappling hook" ve "wingsuit" mekaniği

[b]Negatif:[/b]

-Tekrarlayan görevler zamanla sıkıcılaşabiliyor
-Bazen animasyonlar ve ses efektleri garip hissediyor
-Harita üzerindeki fazla aynı türde görevler
-Hikaye derinliği ve karakter gelişimi yetersiz

[b]Genel Değerlendirme[/b]

[b]Oynanış:[/b] 8/10 (Patlamalar, kaos ve özgürlük dolu oyun mekaniği çok eğlenceli fakat tekrar eden görevler tekrara düşebiliyor)
[b]Grafikler:[/b] 8/10 (Çok detaylı ve güzel görünüyor, ancak bazı yerlerde metinler ve animasyonlar eski kalmış gibi hissediliyor)
[b]Hikaye:[/b] 6/10 (Zayıf hikaye ve yetersiz karakter gelişimi)
[b]Genel:[/b] 7.5/10

[b]Sonuç[/b]

Just Cause 3, patlamalar, özgürlük ve aksiyon dolu bir oyun arayanlar için mükemmel bir seçenek. Yıkım, çılgın aksiyonlar ve hızlıca keşfedebileceğiniz harita ile eğlenceli bir deneyim sunuyor. Ancak, hikâye eksikliği ve monotonlaşan görev yapısı nedeniyle uzun süreli oynayışta tekrar edebilen ve sıkıcı hale gelen bir deneyime dönüşebilir. Eğer kısa sürede keyifli bir aksiyon arıyorsanız, bu oyun oldukça tatmin edici olabilir.

185005133.review:
So… as of the writing of this review (or the start of writing it, anyway), I have just finished the campaigns for Just Cause 3 and its DLC, and this is another unique opportunity for me to express my in-depth thoughts on a game immediately after "completing" it. And my thoughts?… Mixed. Very mixed.

Before I get into details, I want to provide some context: I haven't played any of the other Just Cause games, including 4, and I've barely seen or know much about them other than from some cursory research, and vague memories of watching Jacksepticeye play it as a kid and thinking it was the coolest shit ever. As such, this game was my introduction to the world of Just Cause and its gameplay. I am coming in with very fresh eyes. Keep all that in-mind if you're a Just Cause veteran about to shit on me from the clouds while parachuting. Also, please note that I don't usually drop money on games just because they look cool, but monkey sees very high sale, and monkey brain sees action.

Once I bought the game and finally got around to playing it: It was mostly uneventful. Just some riding around on the wing of a plane while shooting at things with rocket launchers; nothing I haven't done before. Immediately after finishing, a character named Mario came up and took a selfie with me (cringe). Yeah, if there were any thoughts left in my head that this game was gonna take itself seriously, those were all shot with rocket launchers and then photographed Logan Paul-style. It wasn't hard to see why kid me thought this game was going to be the bomb.

The biggest hurdle to the early half of my playthrough were the controls, which are comically bad, especially by default. To be frank: It's not hard to see that Just Cause 3 was a "consoles first" game, with the Windows version seemingly being an afterthought. I know this because some psychopath thought that pressing and holding keys should do completely different things with no way to bind the actions seperately, and that binding the sticky bombs to Caps Lock by default was a good idea when the 4 key is RIGHT THERE.

Even over that, though, Rico has a frequent tendency to just not do what you want him to. Ideally, there should be as little of a disconnect between "what the player wants to do" and "what Rico is doing" as possible, but more often than should happen, these things are not the same. For example: You're trying to grapple at something, but "Oh no!" A pole is in the way and is blocking Rico's direct path to the target! How do we resolve this issue? Do we:

	A. Just let Rico slide on the wall until he's either freed or the player gives up
	B. Let Rico walk or jump on surfaces while he's grappling that are not his grapple target (would take more resources but would be the most elegant answer)
	S. Make Rico re-grapple at wherever the player is looking after a few seconds if he doesn't make it to where he should be on time

Why is the third option "S"? Because that's the Stupid option. And that's the choice the devs actually went for. I know it seems petty to put emphasis on this one relatively small issue, but the grapplehook is *the* defining game mechanic of the Just Cause series (to my knowledge), and thus it should be as polished as possible. I shouldn't be getting punished because of some debris blocking me in a heated moment.

Actually, that's a good segway for me to discuss the difficulty. I'm not ashamed to admit I hit my desk more than a few times after dying in this game, which I never would've seen coming at first. "Regenerating health? Insane maneuverability? The ability to hijack almost any vehicle? AND dying is only a time penalty – Barely any progress is lost and you get your ammo BACK? This game is forgiving as hell!" No. It's INSIDIOUS. Oh sure, your health regenerates, but have fun getting to cover in the middle of that barren wasteland – while being *bombed*! Yeah, you can sure move fast, but that doesn't stop them from easily shooting you MID-AIR like fucking anti-aircraft guns (and don't get me started on the ACTUAL anti-aircraft guns)! But don't worry, you can get into those attack helicopters and turn this whole battle around – just as soon as Rico's done dicking about under the helicopter and taking enough of his sweet-fucking-time evicting the driver that another helicopter is able to swat you away like you're an insect. To cap this off before I vent for even longer: Just Cause 3 may start off easy, but you can just as easily get overwhelmed before you even have a chance to do anything about it, and you can die due to circumstances that feel entirely out of your control. Maybe I just suck bombs, or maybe there's something I'm missing, but regardless this explosive frustration is what I'll probably remember Just Cause 3 for most.

What else do I remember Just Cause 3 for, though? The story, of course!… Hah, just kidding: There's not much there worth remembering. We create chaos and casualties in the name of "liberty," an Autistic woman suicide bombs herself for literally no reason, and evil DJ mustache man does *eeevil*. That's the cliffnotes version. DJ Ravello (His actual name is Di Ravello but with the game's font and my shitty eyesight the 'i' looked like a 'j' at first so I rolled with it) is pretty much just forgettable Hitler-like villain #2,700,000. The story is nothing but a vehicle for the gameplay, which I suppose is all it needs to be, but despite that I can't help but find myself disappointed, especially considering there are little hints of potential hidden throughout the story.

For example: DJ Ravello has some sick mixtapes that he littered around Medici that provide additional backstory, but even for somebody like me who salivates at fictional politics and government corruption in media: It's boring. Just a lot of "I poisoned X and made Y my bitch" over and over again. For ~30 tracks. Perhaps a little more creative than the sex/drugs/money trifecta that dominates rap lyrics, but not by much. I only collected and listened to about half of them before quitting. It all makes me wonder why they even bothered adding these to the game at all, which I feel is a shame. I don't know if it's obvious or not, but I'm actually a writer – Or at least I consider myself one. I enjoy creative writing, and I even have a book in the works which tackles government corruption, so when I think about this game's story all I feel is disappointment. In my very brief research on the first game (looking at its Steam page) I noticed a not-so-subtle nod to the CIA in there, and just thinking about that fills my mind with Spec Ops: The Line-esque ideas for a story that'd play into the game's themes perfectly. Could you imagine if the plot of Just Cause 3 was that you're a special operative sent in to overthrow the "corrupt" government of some South American country, being trained by Marine Corps instructors and armed with the best gear, only to have it all be ripped away mid-way through the game as the CIA attempt to backstab you and paint you as a terrorist (which you technically are)? That's just what I day-dreamt up as I was playing the game, I swear, please don't assassinate me.

Oh good lord, this review is 7000+ characters long already! I need to try to end this soon or nobody will read it except for a few freaks! OK, **TL;DR: Anything besides shooting feels janky; The story could've been a story; The music is forgettable and barely present; The visuals are good, but you better get used to them as those same pretty landscapes and concrete buildings are 90% of what you'll be seeing; It feels much like a predecessor to the modern terrible AAA game; My desk lost years of its life throughout my playthrough.** If you want further elaboration on the game's flaws, feel free to check my profile for the reviews of the DLC (assuming I write them)!

184951583.review:
Just Cause™ 3 — это открытый мир боевик, который предлагает игрокам возможность наслаждаться масштабными действиями и разрушениями. Игра продолжает традиции предыдущих частей, сосредоточенных на захватывающих моментах, паркуре и, конечно же, полной свободе действий.

Первое, что бросается в глаза, — это масштаб мира. Игроки могут исследовать обширные локации, полные уникальных достопримечательностей, от тропических пляжей до горных массивов. Графика выглядит впечатляюще, и внимание к деталям создает атмосферу живого мира. Каждая территория полна секретов и возможностей для разрушения.

Just Cause™ 3 предлагает невероятную свободу действий. Игрок может использовать парашют, крюк и различные транспортные средства для выполнения миссий или просто для развлечения. Это создает множество сценариев и возможностей для создания собственных приключений. Разрушение объектов и зданий становится основным элементом игрового процесса, что приносит массу удовольствия.

Сюжет не является основным фокусом игры, но предоставляет достаточно мотивации для выполнения задач. История о борьбе с диктатором может показаться неоригинальной, но она служит основой для хаотичного игрового процесса. Миссии разнообразны и предлагают различные цели, однако некоторые игроки могут считать их повторяющимися.

Несмотря на все плюсы, Just Cause™ 3 имеет и свои недостатки. Некоторые игроки сообщают о проблемах с производительностью на определенных платформах, а также о наличии багов, которые могут иногда отвлекать от игрового процесса. 

В общем, Just Cause™ 3 — это отличное развлечение для любителей экшн-игр, предлагающее захватывающие моменты, свободу действий и множество способов проявить креативность. Если вы ищете игру для того, чтобы просто погрузиться в адреналиновую атмосферу приключений, это отличный выбор.

184712367.review:
Just Cause 3 is a sandbox of chaos and destruction, offering players an exhilarating playground where blowing things up is not just encouraged—it’s the entire point. Set in the stunning Mediterranean-inspired island of Medici, the game provides a massive open world teeming with opportunities for mayhem, exploration, and creative destruction.

As Rico Rodriguez, you’re equipped with a grappling hook, parachute, and wingsuit, tools that make traversing the world a joy. The mobility mechanics are some of the best in any open-world game, allowing you to seamlessly transition between flying, driving, and grappling with fluidity and style. The wingsuit, in particular, feels like a revelation, turning simple travel into an exciting challenge of precision and speed.

The destruction mechanics are the heart of Just Cause 3. Blowing up military bases, bridges, and fuel depots is immensely satisfying, with explosions that feel weighty and cinematic. The game encourages creativity, whether it’s tethering objects together for chaotic results or stringing enemies to fuel tanks and watching the fireworks. Every encounter feels like an opportunity to experiment and cause as much havoc as possible.

Visually, the game is stunning, with vibrant colors, beautiful landscapes, and dynamic weather effects that bring Medici to life. The sheer scale of the world is impressive, and while the story may not be particularly deep or memorable, it serves its purpose as a backdrop for the action.

However, the game isn’t without its flaws. Performance issues, especially on older systems, can occasionally detract from the experience. The repetitive mission structure and lack of meaningful variety in objectives may also wear thin over time. But for those who revel in open-world chaos, these shortcomings are easy to overlook.

Just Cause 3 excels at being a fun, over-the-top action game. It’s not about deep storytelling or intricate mechanics—it’s about strapping a rocket to a cow and watching what happens. For fans of explosive, carefree gameplay, it’s a must-play adventure.

184517894.review:
В Just Cause 3 Рико, уволившийся после долгой службы из Агентства, приезжает на свою вторую родину – Медичи, государство, расположенное в Средиземном море. По приезде в Медичи Рико встречает своего старого друга детства – Марио Фриго, а также инженера Агентства – Дайму Али Умар Аль-Масри (с которой он был знаком до JC1 во время его миссии в Гватемале).

Страной управляет генерал Себастьяно Ди Равелло, известный своими нечеловеческими методами, садистскими наклонностями, сверхмощным бавариевым оружием и высококлассной армией, верно служащей ему. Он получил власть в 1985 году благодаря лжи, манипуляциям, интригам и крови. Он считал президента Медичи Данте и его правительство трусами и тряпками, которые боялись собственного народа и о которых вытирали ноги правители других стран. Также имела место коррупция, разрушавшая страну изнутри. Отправными точками диктатуры можно считать убийство президента и срыв выборов (всё было подстроено Ди Равелло), а также "Ночь Костров". После них власть оказалась в руках генерала. Все оппоненты диктатора либо бежали из страны, либо были репрессированы. Север региона Инсула-Стриате был буквально выжжен и обезлюжен армией генерала для построения и ремонта военных баз, аванпостов, военной железной дороги и развёртывания крупной добычи бавария. В каждом городе страны воцарилась пропаганда, а большинство технологических достижений перешло под контроль армии.

Рико встречает Сопротивление в плохом состоянии, но он готов поднять повстанцев с колен и развернуть полномасштабную революцию по всему Медичи, ведь это страна, где он провёл всё детство, а Себастьяно Ди Равелло причастен к убийству родителей главного героя. В течение игры главный герой освобождает города и посёлки, уничтожает военные базы и аванпосты, а также ровняет с землёй центкомы генерала, держащие контроль над каждым регионом. Каждый населённый пункт обладает уникальными ландшафтом и компоновкой, а также разными наборами инфраструктуры, которую игроку нужно уничтожать для освобождения пункта. Освобождение всех пунктов в провинции освобождает провинцию, но для освобождения всего региона следует пройти крайнюю сюжетную миссию в этом регионе (по сути революция в регионе). Оставшиеся пункты (а значит и провинции) можно будет освободить когда угодно. Также игроку предоставляется необъятное количество дополнительных заданий (некоторые появляются случайно в режиме реального времени) на любой вкус и цвет. В игре существует несколько биомов (поля, пляжи, пещеры, внутренние воды, горы, леса лиственные/хвойные, места добычи бавария).

Наставнику Рико Шелдону опять приходится играть на обе стороны, так как Себастьяно с начала своей власти является близким партнёром Агентства (благодаря минералу баварию, который добывается только в Медичи и который может использоваться как бесконечный источник энергии, оружие и др.), и последнее не одобряет действия Родригеса. "Это для повстанцев?... Или для Ди Равелло?..." - спрашивает Рико у своего куратора в начале игры, указывая на ящики с вооружением.

В течение игры Родригесу придётся не только бороться с армией и милицией диктатора, но и вновь встретиться с "Чёрной Рукой", а точнее с её элитными частями, работающими на генерала в обмен на баварий.

Также Рико знакомится с Алессией, которая вещает на революционном радио и будет сообщать об освобождении каждого города и сообщать о дополнительных заданиях. При освобождении баз будет вещать пропагандист с "Радио Ди Равелло", который будет пытаться завуалировать разрушения баз и революцию под управляемый и планы правительства. Как окажется далее, он сам не рад своему положению, ведь находится в неволе. С каждой освобождённой базой он будет всё больше впадать в депрессию и начнёт срываться, отходя от сути текста, а также будет просить о помощи от Сопротивления.

Рико и Марио помогают спастись перебежчику Зино Антификаре, который был учёным в бавариевом отделе генерала. Он обещает помочь Сопротивлению. Далее Родригес встречает контрабандистов Аннику и Тео, которые помогают повстанцам в миссиях по подрыву производства бавария в обмен на бавариевый танк. Дайма создаёт ЭМИ для борьбы с бавариевыми танками. Потом происходит встреча Шелдона и Ди Равелло. Последний обвиняет первого и Агентство в предательстве, так как "именно Том мог показать, как бороться с танками".

Вскоре Рико и его друг Марио осознают, что в Сопротивлении есть шпион. Кто-то передаёт данные о каждом шаге повстанцев диктатору. Контрабандисты Тео и Анника подозревают Шелдона. Вскоре раскрывается, что кротом был "сменивший сторону" Зино, специально засланный генералом, а Том был всё время чист. Он клянётся Родригесу, что никогда его не предаст. При этом Рико не забывает случаи, когда техасец пытался мешать планам Сопротивления во благо Агентству. Далее Рико подозревает, что генерал, «Чёрная Рука» (у которой контракт с правителем Медичи и которая встречалась с Рико в первой части) и он сам как-то тесно связаны под началом Агентства.

В Медичи возвращается политический лидер повстанцев Роза Мануэла, которая по идее должна стать честно избранным президентом и новым лидером после Ди Равелло. Тео и Анника присоединяются к повстанцам, когда Рико освобождает их бывшую команду. Сопротивление успешно отражает все атаки взбешённого генерала. Рико уничтожает бавариевое оружие, а потом и все сведения о баварии и "откатывает его исследования на полвека назад", но ценой жизни Даймы. Рико впадает в ярость. Он находит и убивает загнанного в угол Ди Равелло (либо позволяет совершить диктатору суицид, в зависимости от выбора игрока). Перед смертью тот говорит, что обязан свой властью Агентству. Медичи получает свободу.

В дополнениях Рико сталкивается с корпорацией "иДЕН", которая вела исследования над баварием и арендовала территории у президента Данте, а позже у Себастьяно; разрабатывала оружие для Агентства, искусственный интеллект и технологии по управлению климатом (при этом имела контракт с генералом, а также совместно вела работу с его учёными, включая Дайму Аль-Масри; была спонсирована "щедрым благотворителем из Южной Америки", Леоном Эспиносой, отцом Оскара). Также Родригес идёт на прямую конфронтацию с "Чёрной Рукой", имеющей свои территории в Медичи и изъявшей часть бавариевого оборудования вымершей корпорации, а в дальнейшем вернувшейся на базу где-то в Южной Америке. Потом Шелдон в очередной раз подставляет Рико, украв всю добычу от ограбления "Чёрной Руки". Родригес разрывает отношения с ним.

184201657.review:
[h3] Pros: [/h3]

[b] Incredible Freedom of Movement: [/b] The combination of the grappling hook, parachute, and wingsuit creates a unique traversal experience. You can zip across the map, dive off cliffs, or soar between mountains seamlessly.
[b] Explosive Gameplay: [/b] Destruction is the name of the game. Blowing up bridges, fuel tanks, and enemy bases never gets old, and the game encourages you to find the most creative ways to wreak havoc.
[b] Stunning Visuals: [/b] The Mediterranean-inspired world is breathtaking, with sprawling coastlines, lush landscapes, and vibrant villages that make exploration a visual treat.
[b] Varied Vehicles and Arsenal: [/b] From helicopters and jets to boats and cars, the game offers a wide array of vehicles to play with. The weapons are equally diverse, catering to every destructive whim.

[h3] Cons: [/h3]

[b] Excessive Grind: [/b] Progression relies heavily on repetitive tasks. Liberating towns and destroying outposts starts to feel like a chore after a while, as the game pushes you to grind for upgrades and challenges.
[b] Performance Issues: [/b] Even on capable hardware, the game occasionally suffers from frame rate drops and long load times, which can disrupt the experience.
[b] Repetitive Mission Design: [/b] While the sandbox is engaging, the main and side missions often boil down to similar objectives, reducing the sense of variety.
[b] Limited Enemy Variety: [/b] Combat feels predictable due to the lack of diverse enemy types, making encounters less dynamic as the game progresses.

7/10

183995800.review:
Just Cause 3 is the epitome of “why do we need laws of physics?” The game takes everything you love about open-world chaos and cranks it up to 11, then gives you a rocket launcher, a wingsuit, and the freedom to blow up anything in sight. The plot? Well, let’s just say it’s an excuse to give you a giant island to wreck. You play as Rico Rodriguez, the ultimate “screw-it-I’m-doing-it-my-way” hero, who’s out to take down a dictator and liberate the people, all while leaving a trail of destruction behind him. Explosions? Check. Insane stunts? Check. Everything explodes in a satisfying, fireball-filled symphony that will have you giggling with delight. Whether you’re slinging yourself across the map using your grappling hook or watching a helicopter explode in mid-air as you zip away in a car, Just Cause 3 is the chaos playground we never knew we needed.

But what truly makes Just Cause 3 special? It’s not just about the explosions (although that’s a huge part of the fun). The game gives you a unique set of toys to play with, like the grappling hook and wingsuit, which let you do ridiculous things that other games simply don’t allow. Want to attach a car to a helicopter and watch it soar through the sky, only to detonate it mid-air? You can. Want to hijack a tank, toss it off a cliff, and then watch it roll down and explode in an epic chain reaction? You can do that too. The level of freedom here is insane, and the more you explore, the more ridiculous stunts you can pull off. It’s the kind of game that doesn’t take itself seriously, but in the best way possible—every mission feels like an excuse to see how much you can break the game and have fun doing it.

The world of Just Cause 3 is one of its strongest points. The map is huge, and filled with mountains, beaches, and cities just begging to be obliterated. What’s even better is how satisfying it feels to liberate regions by blowing up military installations, taking down enemy propaganda, and generally making the island feel like it’s had its “bad guys” sweeped up. It’s a world that encourages experimentation. The game doesn’t hold your hand and say, “here’s how you should play.” Instead, it gives you a world full of physics and chaos and says, “Go ahead. Make some explosions. Have fun.” If you love open-world games with an emphasis on freedom, destruction, and taking down bad guys in the most ridiculous ways possible, Just Cause 3 is an absolute must-play. Highly recommend to anyone who loves pure, unfiltered action with no moral or logical boundaries. You’ll never look at a helicopter the same way again.

183799480.review:
Explosive, Exhilarating, and Unapologetically Fun!

Just Cause 3 is a masterpiece of chaos and creativity that delivers an adrenaline-fueled experience like no other. Set in the breathtakingly beautiful open world of Medici, this game combines jaw-dropping visuals with a playground of destruction that never gets old.  

From the moment you step into Rico Rodriguez's boots, you're given unparalleled freedom to wreak havoc using an arsenal of weapons, vehicles, and gadgets. The grappling hook and wingsuit mechanics are the crown jewels of the game, offering endless possibilities for traversal and combat. Whether you're zipping between cliffs, soaring over oceans, or tethering enemies to explosive barrels, every moment feels exhilarating.  

The game's open-world design is a standout feature. Medici is sprawling and vibrant, filled with stunning vistas, hidden secrets, and countless opportunities for mischief. The variety of missions and challenges ensures there's always something to do, whether you're liberating villages, toppling massive military bases, or simply experimenting with physics-based mayhem.  

What sets Just Cause 3 apart is its unapologetic embrace of fun. It doesn't take itself too seriously, and that's its greatest strength. The over-the-top action sequences, combined with a lighthearted narrative, make it a joy to play. Even after hours of gameplay, it still manages to surprise and delight with its sheer audacity.  

If you're looking for a game that lets you unleash your inner action hero while exploring a gorgeous open world, Just Cause 3 is an absolute must-play. It's a celebration of chaos, freedom, and fun that will leave you grinning from ear to ear.  

Buy and play it finally!
9/10

183595601.review:
Может быть, с учётом времени, цена и сойдёт за такую игру. Когда вообще не во что поиграть и вы забрели сюда - возьмите попробуйте, пару-тройку вечеров проведёте приятно. 
Если так судить, то игра не такая уж и плохая. Но я бы сказал так : 
- Это плохая игра, которая затягивает своим абсурдом, и это её главный козырь. Тут не нужно думать над какой-то стратегией или последствиями своих действий. Просто разности всё, что хочешь из чего хочешь.

Во всём остальном - крайне сыро.
[list]  
    [*]Очень сильно не хватает драйвого музла (отсутствует напрочь) в моменты экшена.
    [*]Мало экранного времени у персонажей. Как бы тупо не звучало, но персонажи тут как будто даже интересные. Они незаурядные, отпускают дебильные шутки, местами оч забавные. НО КАК ЖЕ МАЛО ВРЕМЕНИ У НИХ...
    [*]Несоизмеримые размеры карты и её население. Очень много поселений, которые уже в печёнках сидят своим однообразием. То же касается и военных баз. Что мешало взять качеством? Непонятно.
    [*]Крайне слабая физика транспорта: наземного, водного, воздушного. При всём его разнообразии пользоваться им...боже упаси. Только в рамках испытаний, которых тут, опять же, через чур много.
[/list]

И вот поймай разработчики этот баланс между наполнением контента и его качесвтом, смыслом. Игра была бы куда круче. 
Со старта игра прям выносит атмосферой игр 2014-15 годов. Сочный, огромный мир. Популистские ребяческие демократические нарративы...ммм. Но слабенько тут всё-таки. Слабенько, хоть и со вкусом.

183586461.review:
Just Cause 3 – Explosive, Over-the-Top Mayhem:


Just Cause 3 is a playground of destruction, putting you in the role of Rico Rodriguez, a one-man army with a grappling hook, a wingsuit, and an endless supply of explosives. Set in the stunning Mediterranean-inspired world of Medici, you’ll topple a brutal dictatorship in the most spectacular ways imaginable.

From tethering helicopters to fuel tanks to wingsuiting through breathtaking landscapes, the game encourages creative chaos at every turn. The open world is massive, filled with enemy bases to destroy, vehicles to commandeer, and stunts to pull off.

While the story takes a backseat to the action, Just Cause 3 shines with its emphasis on freedom and destruction. It’s pure adrenaline-fueled fun, perfect for players who love over-the-top action and larger-than-life explosions.
